TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PreserveSigAttribute extends System.Attribute
Public NotInheritable Class PreserveSigAttribute Inherits Attribute
public ref class PreserveSigAttribute sealed : Attribute

summary.span: 指示应取消在 COM 互操作调用期间发生的 HRESULT 或 签名转换。

span.span: Indicates that the HRESULT or signature transformation that takes place during COM interop calls should be suppressed.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将此特性应用于方法。You can apply this attribute to methods. 默认情况下， [Tlbexp.exe （类型库导出程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md)可确保转换时才返回 S_OK HRESULT 的调用以便 [out，retval] 参数用作函数返回值。By default, the [Tlbexp.exe (Type Library Exporter)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbexp-exe-type-library-exporter.md) ensures that a call that returns an HRESULT of S_OK is transformed such that the [out, retval] parameter is used as the function return value. 将被放弃，则为 S_OK HRESULT。The S_OK HRESULT is discarded. 有关以外，则为 S_OK Hresult，运行时将引发异常，并放弃 [out，retval] 参数。For HRESULTs other than S_OK, the runtime throws an exception and discards the [out, retval] parameter. 当你将与托管的方法签名，特性化方法的托管和非托管签名相等。When you apply the to a managed method signature, the managed and unmanaged signatures of the attributed method are identical. 如果该成员返回多个成功的 HRESULT 值，并且你想要检测的不同值，保留原始的方法签名是必需的。Preserving the original method signature is necessary if the member returns more than one success HRESULT value and you want to detect the different values. 由于大多数 COM 成员通过应用返回一个 HRESULT， ，你可以检索一个整数，表示是成功还是失败的 HRESULT。Since most COM member return an HRESULT, by applying the , you can retrieve an integer representing the success or failure HRESULT. Tlbexp.exe 保留任何 [out，retavl] 作为 out 参数托管签名中的参数。Tlbexp.exe preserves any [out, retavl] parameters as out parameters in the managed signature. [Tlbimp.exe （类型库导入程序）](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md)也适用此属性，则它将该属性应用到的调度接口导入类型库时。The [Tlbimp.exe (Type Library Importer)](~/docs/framework/tools/tlbimp-exe-type-library-importer.md) also applies this attribute; it applies the attribute to dispinterfaces when it imports a type library. > [!NOTE] > 返回类型的， ，和不受类时间的互操作发生，则从 COM 托管代码和托管的代码将标有类。Return types of , , and are not supported by the class when interoperation occurs from COM to managed code and the managed code is marked with the class. 当你尝试使用与这些返回类型之一在这些情况中，类引发。When you attempt to use one of these return types with the class during these conditions, a is thrown. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何 Tlbexp.exe 将转换的 C# 方法而无需到 COM 类型库导出程序集时。The following example shows how Tlbexp.exe converts a C# method without when exporting an assembly to a COM type library. 托管的签名：Managed signature: ``` int DoSomething (long l); ``` 非托管的签名：Unmanaged signature: ``` HRESULT DoSomething ([in] long l, [out, retval] int * i); ``` 当你将的相同的 C# 方法和导出该程序集，该方法转换不同于前面的示例。When you apply to the same C# method and export the assembly, the method conversion differs from the previous example. 请注意，Tlbexp.exe 将中删除 HRESULT 和 [out，retval] 参数修饰符。Notice that Tlbexp.exe removes the HRESULT and the [out, retval] parameter modifier. 托管的签名：Managed signature: ``` [PreserveSig] int DoSomething (long l); ``` 非托管的签名：Unmanaged signature: ``` int DoSomething ([in] long l); ```

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
